message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an introductory price of $9,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the introductory price, my budget for this product is $10,000.  Would you be willing to come down to that price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering your budget and the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $9,800 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, $10,000 is still my absolute limit. If you're unable to come down to that price, I'll have to consider my other options.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I appreciate your patience and understanding in this matter. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $10,000 for the product, which aligns closely with your budget. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.
